## Description {#details}

This struct provides a method for customizing the way a cast is performed.

It inherits from <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible">CastIsPossible</a>, to support the case of declaring many <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible">CastIsPossible</a> specializations without having to specialize the full <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a>.

In order to specialize different behaviors, specify different functions in your <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> specialization. For isa&lt;&gt; customization, provide:

<code>static bool isPossible(const From &amp;f)</code>

For cast&lt;&gt; customization, provide:

<code>static To doCast(const From &amp;f)</code>

For dyn&#95;cast&lt;&gt; and the &#42;&#95;if&#95;present&lt;&gt; variants&#39; customization, provide:

<code>static To <a href="#a09597b5e97eabe6d1cc60e6846a989a3">castFailed()</a></code> and <code>static To doCastIfPossible(const From &amp;f)</code>

Your specialization might look something like this:

template&lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt;</a> : public <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible">CastIsPossible&lt;foo, bar&gt;</a> &#123; static inline foo doCast(const bar &amp;b) &#123; return foo(const&#95;cast&lt;bar &amp;&gt;(b)); &#125; static inline foo <a href="#a09597b5e97eabe6d1cc60e6846a989a3">castFailed()</a> &#123; return foo(); &#125; static inline foo doCastIfPossible(const bar &amp;b) &#123; if (!CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt;::isPossible(b)) return <a href="#a09597b5e97eabe6d1cc60e6846a989a3">castFailed()</a>; return doCast(b); &#125; &#125;;

Definition at line 476 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
